_header: I-heareth of one little tale that I you will tell
Subjects: Christ, Passion of; Passion, meditations o
_description: The Passion of Our Lord — 706 lines in couplets

BodAsh1449.First Lines:
Hereþ uv one lutele tale . þat ich eu wille telleAs we
                    vyndeþ hit iwrite in þe godspelle…
BodAsh1449.Last Lines:
…þet heo hyne myhte wreye and don of lyf dayeAs hit nehyh
                    lechte to
BodAsh1449.Attributed Title:
Ici cumence la passiun Ihu Crist en engleis. Incip. prologus (p.
                    163)

OxfJesus29.First Lines:
Ihereþ ny one lutele tale þat ich eu wille telleAs we
                    vyndeþ hit i write in þe godspelle…
OxfJesus29.Last Lines:
…And heo vre erende bere sois hire ywuneMid alle oþer
                    halewe to hire swete sune Amen
OxfJesus29.Note: Transcript by Lhuyd in Oxford,  Bodleian Library Ashmole 1449 (SC 7554), pp.163-6.
OxfJesus29.Attributed Title: Ici cumence la passyun ihesu crist en engleys (f. 144)
OxfJesus29.Editions:
Morris,  Richard,
                        ed.  
             An Old English Miscellany: A Bestiary, Kentish Sermons, Proverbs of
                Alfred and Religious Poems of the Thirteenth Century.
